00006 void handleFatalProcessFault(FAULT_ID id, FAULT_MSG msg)
00007 {
00008         printf("Error, process %i faulted with id %i error message %s. Forced to exit from memory\n", get_current_process()->m_ID, id, msg);
00009 
00010         if (get_current_process()->m_ID == 0 || get_current_process()->m_ID == 1)
00011         {
00012                 PANIC("FATAL KERNEL FAULT");
00013         }
00014

00016 
00017         for (;;)
00018         {
00019                 scheduler_on_tick();
